articles.title: Congratulations to Albanian President
articles.content:
Congratulations to Albanian President 
						
 Pyongyang, June 17 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, sent a congratulatory message to Bujar Nishani upon his election as president of Albania on June 15.
					 Kim in the message wished him success in his work for the country's development and prosperity.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Greets Seychellois President
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Greets Seychellois President 
						
 Pyongyang, June 17 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, sent a message of greeting to James Alix Michel, president of Seychelles, Sunday on its national day.
					 In the belief that the bilateral ties of friendship and cooperation would grow stronger in the future, Kim in the message wished the people of the country steady progress and prosperity.

articles.title: DPRK Foreign Ministry Spokesman Blasts U.S. Secretary of State's Reckless Remarks
articles.content:
DPRK Foreign Ministry Spokesman Blasts U.S. Secretary of State's Reckless Remarks 
 Pyongyang, June 17 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the DPRK Foreign Ministry Sunday gave the following answer to the question put by KCNA as regards the reckless remarks made by the U.S. secretary of State against the DPRK:
					  U.S. authorities are imprudently talking about "human rights record" in the DPRK and "the issue of its people's living" these days whenever an opportunity presents itself. Typical of them is U.S. Secretary of State Hillary Clinton. 
					
					 It was the U.S. that has long antagonized and threatened the DPRK, compelling it to build defence capability to cope with it. It is, however, urging the DPRK to give priority to "people's living." This is a hypocritical act of causing illness and then administering medicine.
					
					 It was an undying historical feat that leader Kim Jong Il protected the dignity and supreme interests of the country and nation and built the DPRK into a self-defensive military power which no aggressor forces dare to provoke. This serves as an eternal foundation for accelerating the building of a thriving socialist nation.
					
					 The dear respected Kim Jong Un has already set forth a goal of Korean-style development and strategies and tactics for enabling the Korean people to live well with nothing to desire more in the world. He is now wisely leading the general advance of the Korean people for economic construction and improving the standard of people's living.
					
					 The world witnessed the events in December last year when the Korean people bitterly grieved over  the demise of leader Kim Jong Il, the auspicious events in April this year when the country shook with their cheers and the spectacular celebrations of the anniversary of the Korean Children's Union on June 6 this year. These events clearly showed how foolish and ridiculous the U.S. was in its attempt to meddle in the internal affairs of the DPRK over its "human rights issue" and "people's living" and hurt its single-minded unity.
					
					 The DPRK will make sustained efforts to bolster up its nuclear deterrent to guarantee the peace and security of the country and the nation as long as the U.S. persistently antagonizes it, in actuality, while saying that it has no hostile intent on the former. 
					
					 The munitions industry of the DPRK has now a foundation and capacity to steadily boost its nuclear deterrent by itself without letting its people fasten their belts any longer.
					
					 It is the U.S. where people's livelihood and vital rights present themselves as serious problems, in fact, as 99 percent of its population is exploited by those who account for just one percent.
					
					 Hillary would be well advised to pay more attention to the issues of economic crisis and huge hordes of jobless people, which have become so serious that they may dash the hope of the administration of the Democratic Party for stay in power.
					
					 The passage of time will prove that the Korean-style socialist system chosen by the people of the DPRK will prosper fast unlike the American-style capitalist system.

articles.title: Talks between Party Delegations of DPRK and Myanmar Held
articles.content:
Talks between Party Delegations of DPRK and Myanmar Held
						
 Pyongyang, June 17 (KCNA) -- Talks were held between the delegations of the Workers' Party of Korea and the Union Solidarity and Development Party, Union of Myanmar in Myanmar on June 14.
					 Present there from the WPK side were members of the delegation headed by Kim Yong Il, alternate member of the Political Bureau and secretary of the Central Committee of the WPK, and Kim Sok Chol, DPRK ambassador to Myanmar and from the Myanmar party side were the members of the delegation headed by the organizational secretary who is a member of the Central Executive Committee of the party.
					
					 At the talks both sides informed each other of their party activities and exchanged views on boosting the friendly and cooperative ties between the two parties and on other issues of mutual concern. 
					
					 The organizational secretary, on behalf of the party, government and people of Myanmar, sincerely hoped that the dear respected Kim Jong Un would lead the Korean people to shining victory.
					
					 The DPRK turned into an invincible power under the guidance of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il, peerlessly great men, he stressed. It is a great fortune of the Korean people to hold Kim Jong Un in high esteem as supreme leader.
					
					 Noting that WPK's visit to Myanmar is a token of support and solidarity for the Union Solidarity and Development Party, Union of Myanmar, the organizational secretary voiced his determination to activate cooperation and exchange between the two parties.

articles.title: Political Figure of Myanmar Expresses Will to Boost Relations with WPK
articles.content:
Political Figure of Myanmar Expresses Will to Boost Relations with WPK
						
 Pyongyang, June 17 (KCNA) -- The acting chairman of the Union Solidarity and Development Party, Union of Myanmar said he expressed profound thanks to the dear respected Kim Jong Un for paying deep attention to the development of the relations between the two parties and the two countries.
					 He said this when meeting and having a friendly talk with the delegation of the Workers' Party of Korea headed by Kim Yong Il, alternate member of the Political Bureau and secretary of the C.C., the WPK, on a visit to the country on June 14.
					
					 No one can match the single-minded unity achieved by President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il, he noted.
					
					 He voiced conviction that Kim Jong Un would lead the Korean people to greater victory and prosperity.
					
					 He expressed the will to further develop the friendly and cooperative relations between the two parties and the two countries in the future.

articles.title: KPA Military Band Awarded Prize at International Military Band Festival
articles.content:
KPA Military Band Awarded Prize at International Military Band Festival
						
 Pyongyang, June 17 (KCNA) -- The Military Band of the Korean People's Army participated in the First International Far Eastern Military Band Festival in Khabarovsk, Russia. It was awarded festival prize.
					 Russia paid special attention to the participation of the KPA Military Band, while hosting the festival. The festival preparatory committee said that the participation of the KPA Military Band high in artistry and military music etiquette would help further increase the significance of the festival.
					
					 Amur Region and various other Far Eastern areas invited the KPA Military Band to give performances in their areas, availing themselves of its participation in the festival.
					
					 The performances given amid great expectation towards the KPA Military Band evoked profound reverence for the great men among audiences.
					
					 Whenever the band played songs expressing boundless reverence for the peerlessly great men, audiences showed their thumbs, loudly shouting "Kim Il Sung!" "Kim Jong Il!" and "Kim Jong Un!"
					
					 Many personages of different social standings, people and soldiers of Russia said that the participation of the KPA Military Band in the festival was a significant event for Russia and the Far Eastern area. It is a great fortune for them to watch the art performance given by Korean artistes thanks to the care of the dear respected Kim Jong Un, they added.
					
					 The organizing committee of the festival specially instituted and presented the festival prize to Kim Jong Un, expressing thanks for sending the KPA Military Band.

articles.title: Implementation of June 15 Joint Declaration Called for
articles.content:
Implementation of June 15 Joint Declaration Called for
						
 Pyongyang, June 17 (KCNA) -- Members of the Taejon Headquarters of the South Side Committee for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration and other civic and public organizations, citizens and students in Taejon, south Korea held a rally in Taejon on June 2 to mark the 12th anniversary of the publication of the June 15 joint declaration.
					 At the rally speakers said that the Korean nation divided into two should become one without fail.
					
					 We cannot hand the divided country to posterity, they noted, calling for achieving the reunification of the country through positive actions.
					
					 The rally was followed by a marathon race held to mark the anniversary.
					
					 Prior to the start of the marathon race, the full text of the June 15 joint declaration was read out.
					
					 Running 6.15 km, the participants in the marathon race hardened their determination to achieve the reunification of the nation by implementing the joint declaration despite the present regime's moves to escalate confrontation against reunification.

articles.title: Feats Performed by 618 Shock Brigade Lauded
articles.content:
Feats Performed by 618 Shock Brigade Lauded 
						
 Pyongyang, June 17 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il made sure that the 618 Shock Brigade was inaugurated in 2000, unfolding a bold plan to spruce up revolutionary battle sites and revolutionary sites.
					 Under the wise leadership and loving care of the party and the leader the shock brigade has performed feats in sprucing up sacred places of the revolution and carrying out major projects over the last 12 years.
					
					 Its members completed the projects for sprucing up revolutionary battle sites and revolutionary sites including the Monument to Victory in Battles in Musan Area under hard natural conditions in alpine area in the northern part of the country and under the situation where everything was in short supply.
					
					 They constructed and renovated the Paektu Museum, the Cultural Hall of Samjiyon County, hundreds of public buildings and houses for thousands of families and built roads of hundreds of km and many bridges.
					
					 They completed the Samsu Power Station with a large dam built with sand and stone in a matter of little over two years as a monumental structure.
					
					 They performed feats in the construction of fruit farms.
					
					 They rushed to Kosan County in 2009 and concentrated efforts on carrying out a large-scale land realignment project. They removed a large quantity of earth, turning a total of more than 1 800 hectares of land into orchards.
					
					 Trench-like hollows with a total length of over 2 400km were dug, at least 100 000 props produced and millions of fruit trees planted.
					
					 Tens of km of roads and waterways stretching to all directions appeared, various structures were built in over 200 places and hundreds of dwelling houses and public buildings were constructed.
					
					 The project for expanding the capacity of the Kosan Fruit Farm is making rapid progress.
					
					 Signal successes were also reported from members of the shock brigade undertaking the construction project at the Taedonggang Combined Fruit Farm. They wrought miracles every day in the wake of the fulfillment of their assignments for land realignment, fruit tree planting  and a pig farm construction.
					
					 They laid a foundation for completing ahead of schedule the projects including the Central Tree Nursery.
					
					 They are demonstrating indomitable mental power in the efforts to create something out of nothing in hearty response to the call of the Workers' Party of Korea.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Slams Japan's Attempt to Purchase F-35
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Slams Japan's Attempt to Purchase F-35 
						
 Pyongyang, June 17 (KCNA) -- Japan's attempt to purchase F-35 is a vivid expression of its wild ambition to turn it into a military giant and invade other countries, says Rodong Sinmun Sunday in a bylined article.
					 It goes on:
					
					 The Japanese authorities are set to use this type fighter as a mainstay of the Air "Self-Defense Force" of Japan in the future.
					
					 This is prompted by their intention to hold military and technological edge and military hegemony in Asia-Pacific.
					
					 Japan seeks to play a main role in the joint military operations with the U.S. for launching overseas invasion and gain an equal status in the Japan-U.S. military relationship instead of master-servant relations. 
					
					 Japan's final goal is to reinvade the Asian continent.
					
					 Such action of Japan may upset the military equilibrium in Northeast Asia.
					
					 Various countries of Asia are, therefore, expressing concern about Japan's projected purchase of ultramodern stealth fighter.
					
					 Whenever an opportunity presents itself, Japan cites "threats" from the DPRK and its neighboring countries.
					
					 As seen above, however, threat comes from Japan.
					
					 It is the revolutionary spirit of the army and people of the DPRK to react to the use of force in kind.
					
					 Japan would be well advised to behave itself, well aware that its moves to convert itself into a military giant and realize its wild ambition for overseas invasion will lead to its self-destruction.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun on New History of Independence Made by Kim Il Sung
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun on New History of Independence Made by Kim Il Sung 
						
 Pyongyang, June 17 (KCNA) -- President Kim Il Sung was an outstanding and tested leader of revolution who made the modern history and glorified it under the uplifted banner of independence, says Rodong Sinmun Sunday in a bylined article.
					 It continues:
					
					 Independence was revolutionary faith and a mode of making revolution that the President always cherished and applied, weathering the trial of history in his lifetime.
					
					 It was also a great practice in revolution.
					
					 His revolutionary practices based on independence made a dramatic switchover in the trend of the era and history and changed the world.
					
					 The President's revolutionary practices proved that independence precisely means the justice of history, victory of revolution and the foundation of the development of the fair international relations.
					
					 The national liberation achieved through all-people anti-Japanese resistance waged under the wise leadership of the President clearly showed the world that independence meant the justice of history and victory of revolution.
					
					 The shining successes achieved by the DPRK in the spirit of independence during the building of a new country, the Fatherland Liberation War, the postwar reconstruction and the building of a socialist foundation eloquently explained what justice and truth are and how victory can be won.
					
					 The President steadily developed the relations with other parties and states on the principle of independence.
					
					 The DPRK's establishment of relations with other countries and their development serve as an example in the development of the fair international relations. Many countries endeavored to develop the international relations on the principle of respect for sovereignty, equality and mutual benefit.  Genuine ideal of independence, peace and friendship could be brought into full bloom in the international relations.
					
					 The trend of history in which aggression, war, domination and subjugation had been considered as something unavoidable was put on the orbit of independence.
					
					 There started the era when popular masses in many countries make revolution and construction in conformity with their specific conditions, carving out their destinies by themselves.

articles.title: Koreans Called upon to Achieve Independence, Peace and Reunification in Spirit of June 15 Joint Declaration
articles.content:
Koreans Called upon to Achieve Independence, Peace and Reunification in Spirit of June 15 Joint Declaration
 Pyongyang, June 17 (KCNA) -- The South Side Committee for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration and other civic and public organizations and opposition parties of south Korea held a ceremony in Seoul on June 15 to mark the 12th anniversary of the joint declaration. They said they will dynamically struggle to achieve independence, peace and reunification in the spirit of the June 15 joint declaration.
					 At the ceremony speakers said that the joint declaration is a landmark for reunification to be held fast to by the Korean nation. 
					
					 It was thanks to the June 15 joint declaration that the south and the north could link railways and roads and realize cooperation despite the barrier of division, they noted, adding:
					
					 All these things were blocked and the south and the north are barred from jointly holding June 15 events for reunification. The Lee Myung Bak regime in south Korea is wholly to blame for this.
					
					 The present regime's racket for "eliminating the forces following the north" is a revelation of its intention to bring back the past fascist dictatorial regime.
					
					 Reunification cannot be presented by anyone but it should be achieved through struggle

articles.title: Judgment of Lee Myung Bak Dictatorial Regime Demanded
articles.content:
Judgment of Lee Myung Bak Dictatorial Regime Demanded
						
 Pyongyang, June 17 (KCNA) -- Civic and public organizations of south Korea held a rally in Seoul on June 13 to denounce the brutal Lee Myung Bak dictatorial forces.
					 At the rally speakers said that vital rights of the poor people in the urban areas have been wantonly violated since Lee Myung Bak seized power.
					
					 Such being the situation, the dictatorial regime has not taken any measure, driving a large number of poor people into a cliff, they deplored.
					
					 It is impossible to achieve people's wellbeing as long as the present regime for the rich only is allowed to stay in power, they stated.
					
					 They called on all people to achieve solidarity and judge the Lee Myung Bak regime through the "presidential" election slated to take place in December and set up a regime for the people.

articles.title: Forcible Lay-off Protested by S. Korean Unionists
articles.content:
Forcible Lay-off Protested by S. Korean Unionists
						
 Pyongyang, June 17 (KCNA) -- Members of the metal trade unions of south Korea held a rally in Seoul on June 13 in protest against Hyundai Motors' forcible cut-throat lay-off.
					 At the meeting speakers accused the company side of informing the workers of the cancellation of contracts and lay-off in August.
					
					 This is aimed to scrap the contracts with the workers and forcibly fire them under the pretext of lay-off, they said.
					
					 The workers can never stop their protest as long as the company side persists in lay-off, they stressed, declaring the unionists would get united close in their actions till their demands are met.

articles.title: Anniversary of June 15 Joint Declaration Observed by Koreans in Russia
articles.content:
Anniversary of June 15 Joint Declaration Observed by Koreans in Russia
						
 Pyongyang, June 17 (KCNA) -- The United Confederation of Koreans in Russia observed the 12th anniversary of the June 15 joint declaration.  
					 A photo and book exhibition was held in Saratov Region of Russia from June 10 to 12. 
					
					 On display in its venue were famous works of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il, DPRK books and magazines, the full text of the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration and photos of north-south cooperation and visits in the June 15 era of reunification and photos about the DPRK.
					
					 Visitors to the exhibition said the joint declaration was, indeed, the most realistic great programme for reunification. They vowed to contribute to reunifying the country independently and peacefully in the idea of "By our nation itself".

articles.title: Group for Study of Works of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il Formed in Germany
articles.content:
Group for Study of Works of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il Formed in Germany
						
 Pyongyang, June 17 (KCNA) -- The German Group for the Study of Works of Comrade Kim Il Sung and Comrade Kim Jong Il was inaugurated.
					 An inaugural ceremony took place in Erfurt City on June 11.
					
					 Torsten Schoevitz, vice-chairman of the Communist Party of Germany, was elected chief of the group.
					
					 He said in his speech at the ceremony that he keenly realized the greatness and vitality of the Juche idea through his participation in the World Congress on the Juche Idea and visit to the DPRK, evincing his resolution to study hard the works of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and widely disseminate them.
					
					 A message to the dear respected Kim Jong Un was adopted at the ceremony.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Feats Will Shine For All Ages: Bangladeshi Political Figure
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Feats Will Shine For All Ages: Bangladeshi Political Figure
						
 Pyongyang, June 17 (KCNA) -- Rashed Khan Menon, chairman of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Bangladesh, issued a statement on June 12 on the occasion of the 48th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea. 
					 The statement said:
					
					 Already when he started his work at the C.C., the WPK many years ago, Kim Jong Il considered it as his lifelong mission to strengthen the WPK into the party of President Kim Il Sung. Kim Jong Il taught the immutable truth that a revolutionary party is, in essence, the party of the leader and a political organization which embodies his idea and ensures his leadership. 
					
					 The undying feats he performed by developing Kim Il Sung's Korea dignified with Songun into an indestructible socialist bulwark, independent in politics, self-supporting in the economy and self-reliant in national defence, will shine for all ages.
					
					 We are convinced that the party, army and people of the DPRK will register great successes in the struggle to build a thriving socialist nation and reunify the country peacefully under the wise leadership of the dear respected Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Anniversary of June 15 Joint Declaration Observed Abroad
articles.content:
Anniversary of June 15 Joint Declaration Observed Abroad
						
 Pyongyang, June 17 (KCNA) -- The world hailed the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration as an ever-lasting banner for Korea's reunification. Otete Gaston Mboyo, deputy general secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of Democratic Congo and chairman of the Democratic Congo-Korea Friendship and Solidarity Association, said this in a statement on June 11.
					 The statement said:
					
					 The north and the south of Korea adopted the joint declaration the keynote of which is to reunify the country in the idea of "By our nation itself" on June 15, 2000.
					
					 But the joint declaration which was fully supported by Koreans in the north and the south of Korea and overseas and the world progressives 12 years ago is facing an ordeal due to the U.S. and other foreign forces' interference and perfidy on the part of the Lee Myung Bak group in south Korea.
					
					 It is the most fair and aboveboard way for reunifying Korea to implement the June 15 joint declaration.
					
					 The Democratic Congo-Korea Friendship and Solidarity Association is convinced that the Korean nation will put an end to the foreign forces' interference and thoroughly implement the joint declaration by the concerted efforts of the Koreans and thus achieve the historic cause of national reunification without fail.

articles.title: DPRK's Peace Policy Favored by Organizations of Czech Republic
articles.content:
DPRK's Peace Policy Favored by Organizations of Czech Republic
						
 Pyongyang, June 17 (KCNA) -- The Paektusan Czech-Korean Friendship Association and the Czech Group for the Study and Materialization of the Juche Idea in a joint statement on June 12 fully supported the peace policy of the DPRK.
					 The statement condemned the Lee Myung Bak group and some media of south Korea for maliciously defaming the recent celebrations of the 66th anniversary of the Korean Children's Union.
					
					 No sooner had the south Korean puppet authorities seized power than they totally negated the historic north-south declarations at the instruction of the U.S. ruling quarters, it said, and went on:
					
					 These declarations were hailed by the world, saying peace could settle on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 Through the current provocations of the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors the world clearly learned that the war maniacs of south Korea and the U.S. were inferior to the children of the DPRK in the sense of reason. 
					
					 The south Korean authorities should apologize for their shameless acts and stop the moves to escalate the confrontation with the DPRK.

articles.title: U.S. Hostile Policy toward DPRK Censured by Nepali Paper
articles.content:
U.S. Hostile Policy toward DPRK Censured by Nepali Paper
						
 Pyongyang, June 17 (KCNA) -- The Nepali paper Arpan on June 8 carried an article condemning the U.S. hostile policy toward the DPRK under the title "U.S. choice".
					 The U.S. sustained a defeat in the Korean War and was compelled to sign the armistice agreement for the first time in history, the paper said, noting that in the postwar period the U.S. worked hard to perpetuate its troops' presence in south Korea under the pretext of the south Korea-U.S. "mutual defense treaty". 
					
					 It went on:
					
					 The U.S. forces have persistently refused to pull out of south Korea because of their ambition for world domination.
					
					 It is a realistic requirement to defuse the tension on the Korean Peninsula and improve the DPRK-U.S. relations. 
					
					 The U.S. cannot bring the DPRK to its knees. This is the review of the DPRK-U.S. stand-off for nearly 70 years. It is clear that a new Korean war will lead to a complete ruin of the U.S.
					
					 Now is the time for the U.S. to make a proper choice.

articles.title: June 15 North-South Joint Declaration Supported by British Organizations
articles.content:
June 15 North-South Joint Declaration Supported by British Organizations
 Pyongyang, June 17 (KCNA) -- British organizations issued statements on June 6 and 7 on the occasion of the 12th anniversary of the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration.
					 The British Branch of the Korean Friendship Association in a statement said that the declaration is a beacon of hope as it makes it possible to put an end to the division of Korea forced by foreign forces and achieve reconciliation and unity between the north and the south.
					
					 Fully embodied in the declaration is the Juche-based line for reunification laid down by President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il, it noted, accusing the Lee Myung Bak fascist regime in south Korea of denying the spirit and idea of the declaration and pursuing the anti-reunification policy contrary to it.
					
					 The statement condemned the sycophantic and treacherous act of the Lee puppet regime which is suppressing pro-reunification patriotic forces and progressive personages and making south Korea increasingly dependent on the U.S. and foreign forces.
					
					 The British Association for the Study of Songun Policy and the British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea in their joint statement stressed that the adoption of the declaration was a historic event which heralded the new era in the reunification of Korea and inter-Korean relations.
					
					 It is, at the same time, the shining fruition of the Songun policy pursued by Kim Jong Il. 
					
					 The declaration can be implemented only when the Lee regime is ousted, the joint statement said. It positively supported the Korean people in their struggle to implement the declaration.

articles.title: Bangladeshi Organization Hits S. Korean Authorities for Slandering DPRK
articles.content:
Bangladeshi Organization Hits S. Korean Authorities for Slandering DPRK 
						
 Pyongyang, June 17 (KCNA) -- The Bangladesh Group for the Study of the Songun Policy issued a statement on June 12 denouncing the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors in south Korea for letting loose a spate of invectives against the DPRK.
					 The celebrations of the 66th anniversary of the Korean Children's Union in the DPRK marked a historic occasion in fully demonstrating the greatness of the Workers' Party of Korea which regards it as the most important affair to bring up the rising generation, the statement said.
					
					 It bitterly condemned the Lee Myung Bak regime for uttering all sorts of vituperation against the DPRK whenever it had an auspicious event.
					
					 It urged the Lee regime to stop at once the reckless acts of pushing the situation to catastrophe.
